data.title: Fred K. Geitner, Ronald G. Eierman Process Machinery
data.meta_description: (de Gruyter Stem) Ronald G. Eierman, Fred K. Geitner - Process Machinery_ Risk-Based Commissioning and Startup - An Essential Asset Management Task-De Gruyter (2021) - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview of commissioning and startup activities for process machinery projects. It discusses the importance of planning, organizing resources, developing schedules, and reviewing documentation to ensure a smooth commissioning and startup process. Key tasks include assigning personnel, setting up training programs, preparing operating instructions, assessing availability of testing equipment, identifying external support resources, and planning preventive maintenance and spare parts requirements. Careful planning of commissioning and startup is presented as an essential asset management activity for process plants.
